name: Houkagou Colorful Step: Undou-bu!
storyline: At Private Tokiwa High School that thrives on club activities, there is a rule stating all students must be part of a club. Transfer students Kohinata Natsuko and Haruko managed to narrow their choices down to two clubs but are still unable to choose… Which club will you choose?
summary: Houkago Colorful * Step: Undoubu! is an otome game, developed and published by honeybee+, which was released in Japan in 2014.
